name: Christine aka My Love
wishText: It is March 18 and you know what that means!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! May all your wishes come true!
text2: That's what I was going to do...
text4: I realized that was boring and I wanted to do something
outroText: Happy Birthday, love. Happy Birthday to you!
replayText: Click here if you want to watch it again.
